name: Gravity Sketch
abstract: Think in 3D. Create in 3D. A powerful yet intuitive tool - express 3D ideas in real-time at any scale. Create loose free form sketches, detailed models, and artwork unrestricted.

detail.app_languages: English, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
VR

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Point weight is preserved when changing a stroke or ink to low poly and back.
- Fixed an issue where deleting control points on subD objects would sometimes result in extra control points or faces being deleted with them.
- The screenshot panel no longer disappears when grabbed.
- Polar symmetrical copies strokes no longer stop being mirrored when part of the polar symmetry is connected to the mirror, moved off the world mirror and then disconnected.
- When moving an object with smart move and scaling, the centre of scale now respects the centre of the object.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4E, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
